snippet: A former ambassador who oversaw an audit of the State Department’s Bureau of Diplomatic Security has outlined cases of alleged misconduct by American diplomats and security agents.
abstract: Report by Larry M Dinger, former ambassador who oversaw audit of State Department's Bureau of Diplomatic Security, outlines several cases of alleged misconduct by American diplomats and security agents, part of inquiry into whether senior officials interfered with politically delicate investigation.
lead_paragraph: A former ambassador who oversaw an audit of the State Department’s Bureau of Diplomatic Security has outlined cases of alleged misconduct by American diplomats and security agents.

headline.main: Report Outlines Accusations of Misconduct by Diplomats
headline.print_headline: Report Outlines Accusations Of Misconduct by Diplomats
